Side Effects: no bad side effects from this medication yet. havent really been able to tell if it is "curing" my condition_although i dont think there is actually a cure_ but i sure do notice the pain is relieved for 3 to 4 hours after applied.
Comments: this is the first treatment i have tried for this condition_ aside from oral tetracyclins (which made me vomit) and so far is is controlling my symptoms very effectively
